author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Hindu Education Plus Career Fair is back.

The ninth edition of the fair will be held on April 2 and 3 at Suguna Kalyana Mandapam here between 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.

It will provide students and parents an opportunity to interact with experts from various disciplines and get insights and perspectives on diverse course and career avenues.

Universities, colleges, coaching centres, education consultants, overseas education centres, banks and financial institutions, will participate in the fair.

Discussions

The two-day programme will feature panel discussion and talks by eminent persons from various institutions.

S. Ramalingam, dean, PSG Institute of Medical Sciences and Research Hospital; P. Kanagaraj, free coacher for Civil Services examinations; S. Mahimairaja, dean, TNAU; D. Nedunchezhian, CEO, Technocrats India College Finder; Kirtanya Krishnamurthy, founder, Mind Fresh Training; Sivaprasad Velayudhan, director (operations), Real Works Studio India Pvt Ltd; will be among those who will attend the fair.

The presenting sponsor is Sri Krishna Institutions, and powered by KMCH and Dr. N.G.P. Institutions.

TIPS Global Institute, Kalaignar Karunanidhi Institute of technology, Nehru Group of Institutions, and Kathir College of Engineering are the co-sponsors and in association with The Hindu Tamil.

Registration

Entry is through registration.

To register SMS EPCB name, age to 53030.

Contact

For more details, visit www.thehindueducation fair.com or call 98945 96786/98943 04081.
